item.title: Finally (Zootopia Story) 21
item.media:title: Finally (Zootopia Story) 21
item.media:description:
SPEEDPAINT >>  www.youtube.com/watch?v=BhcZBD…


It's taken a while but the next part is finally here! 
Didn't add an incredible amount of detail cause I wanted to give it a more raw(?) feeling??

I look at this piece as a closing of a chapter~
I coulddddd end the story here cause I'm honestly not sure how many of you are still interested in it haha.
Also, if I do continue..(a lot of the story is planned out already) I have to admit that this will probably be the 'happiest you would see them..for a long..LONG time  

What are your thoughts?? 
__________________________________________________

START OF STORY >> What have they done to you... (Zootopia Story) 1

 << PREVIOUS | NEXT >> ??
 
Please no using without permission/proper credit~! (c) 
___________________________________________________
Tools used >> SAI and Photoshop CC.
  >> www.youtube.com/user/Deathtobu…
 >> neytirix.tumblr.com/
   >> twitter.com/Neytiirix?lang=en&…;
 >> www.twitch.tv/neytiriix 
 >> www.instagram.com/neytirixx/

item.title: ZEYTRIA: Crimson Tanya
item.media:title: ZEYTRIA: Crimson Tanya
item.media:description:
Commissioned by Riaden234 for our Dungeons and Dragons world: ZEYTRIA.

“Heroic adventurer, master swordswoman, a fearsome mercenary, and cunning queen! Listen well friends to the heroic saga of the legendary She-devil, Crimson Tanya!” - The Mercenary Queen Volume One

While there have been many famous mercenaries and adventurers throughout Eodora’s history, few have ever perhaps have managed to attain the legend around them or accomplish as much as Crimson Tanya.

Believed to have been born somewhere on the border of Oberstaad and Gillidan during the aftermath of The Kings’ War, Tanya grew up as an orphan like many other children at that time. However, because of her warped bloodline, Tanya would find it difficult to find acceptance as tiefling and thus would start adventuring across Eodora early on from her childhood.

In the course of her journey, she immersed herself in swordplay, frequently entering in duels and tournaments to make her fortune.  Her reputation to seek out the best and challenge them despite her lack of skill gave her an air of audacity and bravado that drew the attention of other outcast adventurers.  She would quickly forge close bonds with, forming a mercenary band known as the Grey Griffins, spending the next decade fighting for coin across Eodora.

Eventually, a new conflict known as the Black Crusades would arise, driving many to cross the Ivory Strait to the shores of Ubara to fight against the Black Sultanate of Zakar. Tanya and her company would decline to go south, which was fortuitous to say the least, as her company suddenly became the sole defender of the realms unprepared for the arrival of the Hermit.  His own origins were mysterious, as well as his goals, but his rousing tirades against the collective monarchies stirred the peasantry to the point of rebellion.  The Hermit’s army began threatening villages and towns for food and supplies, turning into little more than a ravaneous mob, slaughtering and burning any villages who stood against them.

Unable to stand by and see innocents get slaughtered while the kingdoms remained preoccupied with funding their war efforts overseas, Tanya and her mercenary company offered their services to the gathered rulers.  Sadly, they had no gold to give them, but Tanya put forth one of her famous audacious proposals: grant them a piece of land to settle and maintain and in return, they will end the Hermit’s reign of terror.  With little recourse, the rulers agreed, with the caveat that the land would be where they would defeat the Hermit.

Instead of rushing out to face the zealots, the Grey Griffons took their time, waiting for them to pass through choice land they would fight for.  This angered the rulers, but there was little they could do until the day finally dawned that the mercenaries rode out. Stahlland, a small region in the south of Gillindan, proved to be the battleground, a fertile valley plain on the edge of the Great Lake.  Not only would it be a prize worthy of defending, but the pass into it would also bottleneck the numbers of the Hermit’s army.  With a small force that was dwarfed by the Hermit’s numbers the mercenaries held fast and broke them wave by wave.

For their victory, ownership of the region of Stahlland would fall to Tanya and her commanders. She would end up becoming its first queen with her close allies raised to the rank of nobility.  Word of her rags-to-riches tale inspired many others to take up arms in defense of their homes, ensuring that no one like the Hermit could rampage across the land again.  Soon, swarms of would-be sellswords migrated into Stahlland, transforming it into the mercenary capital of Eodora overnight.

Tanya proved to be a ruler, described by her peers as a mailed fist within a velvet glove.  While she personally believed she had no talent for statecraft, her time as queen saw the land prosper, allowing for the creation of the first constitutional monarchy to implemented in Eodora.  Wanderlust often tugged at her, knowing greater and grander adventures awaited in far off lands, but her sense of duty and responsibility prevented her from doing so.

Thanks to Tanya’s tiefling lifespan, her reign came to a conclusion after forty years, enjoying the good and weathering the bad that came with it. She would peacefully step down from her position as queen and allow for her subjects to vote for the next worthy ruler, elected from Stahlland’s nobility, an act seen as both very controversial, and yet, so bold.  Once Tanya saw that her land was in good hands, she took up her famed sword Crimson Kiss and left for lands unknown.

Her continuing ventures have been sparsely recorded, but she has reportedly traveled the length and breadth of the world.  She remains a living legend to this day, not only to the people of Stahlland but to many aspiring adventurers.
item.description:
Commissioned by Riaden234 for our Dungeons and Dragons world: ZEYTRIA.

“Heroic adventurer, master swordswoman, a fearsome mercenary, and cunning queen! Listen well friends to the heroic saga of the legendary She-devil, Crimson Tanya!” - The Mercenary Queen Volume One

While there have been many famous mercenaries and adventurers throughout Eodora’s history, few have ever perhaps have managed to attain the legend around them or accomplish as much as Crimson Tanya.

Believed to have been born somewhere on the border of Oberstaad and Gillidan during the aftermath of The Kings’ War, Tanya grew up as an orphan like many other children at that time. However, because of her warped bloodline, Tanya would find it difficult to find acceptance as tiefling and thus would start adventuring across Eodora early on from her childhood.

In the course of her journey, she immersed herself in swordplay, frequently entering in duels and tournaments to make her fortune.  Her reputation to seek out the best and challenge them despite her lack of skill gave her an air of audacity and bravado that drew the attention of other outcast adventurers.  She would quickly forge close bonds with, forming a mercenary band known as the Grey Griffins, spending the next decade fighting for coin across Eodora.

Eventually, a new conflict known as the Black Crusades would arise, driving many to cross the Ivory Strait to the shores of Ubara to fight against the Black Sultanate of Zakar. Tanya and her company would decline to go south, which was fortuitous to say the least, as her company suddenly became the sole defender of the realms unprepared for the arrival of the Hermit.  His own origins were mysterious, as well as his goals, but his rousing tirades against the collective monarchies stirred the peasantry to the point of rebellion.  The Hermit’s army began threatening villages and towns for food and supplies, turning into little more than a ravaneous mob, slaughtering and burning any villages who stood against them.

Unable to stand by and see innocents get slaughtered while the kingdoms remained preoccupied with funding their war efforts overseas, Tanya and her mercenary company offered their services to the gathered rulers.  Sadly, they had no gold to give them, but Tanya put forth one of her famous audacious proposals: grant them a piece of land to settle and maintain and in return, they will end the Hermit’s reign of terror.  With little recourse, the rulers agreed, with the caveat that the land would be where they would defeat the Hermit.

Instead of rushing out to face the zealots, the Grey Griffons took their time, waiting for them to pass through choice land they would fight for.  This angered the rulers, but there was little they could do until the day finally dawned that the mercenaries rode out. Stahlland, a small region in the south of Gillindan, proved to be the battleground, a fertile valley plain on the edge of the Great Lake.  Not only would it be a prize worthy of defending, but the pass into it would also bottleneck the numbers of the Hermit’s army.  With a small force that was dwarfed by the Hermit’s numbers the mercenaries held fast and broke them wave by wave.

For their victory, ownership of the region of Stahlland would fall to Tanya and her commanders. She would end up becoming its first queen with her close allies raised to the rank of nobility.  Word of her rags-to-riches tale inspired many others to take up arms in defense of their homes, ensuring that no one like the Hermit could rampage across the land again.  Soon, swarms of would-be sellswords migrated into Stahlland, transforming it into the mercenary capital of Eodora overnight.

Tanya proved to be a ruler, described by her peers as a mailed fist within a velvet glove.  While she personally believed she had no talent for statecraft, her time as queen saw the land prosper, allowing for the creation of the first constitutional monarchy to implemented in Eodora.  Wanderlust often tugged at her, knowing greater and grander adventures awaited in far off lands, but her sense of duty and responsibility prevented her from doing so.

Thanks to Tanya’s tiefling lifespan, her reign came to a conclusion after forty years, enjoying the good and weathering the bad that came with it. She would peacefully step down from her position as queen and allow for her subjects to vote for the next worthy ruler, elected from Stahlland’s nobility, an act seen as both very controversial, and yet, so bold.  Once Tanya saw that her land was in good hands, she took up her famed sword Crimson Kiss and left for lands unknown.

Her continuing ventures have been sparsely recorded, but she has reportedly traveled the length and breadth of the world.  She remains a living legend to this day, not only to the people of Stahlland but to many aspiring adventurers.

item.title: The Punishment of Loki
item.media:title: The Punishment of Loki
item.media:description:
Instagram | Facebook | Shop 


(Music: Nytt Land - Ragnarök)

In Norse mythology, Sigyn is a goddess of fidelity and is the wife of Loki. 🐍  
Sigyn stays with Loki during his punishment, (He is bound by the guts of his own son, the only fetters that he cannot destroy and the venom of snake drips onto his face) she holds out a bowl to catch the dripping venom. However, when the bowl becomes full she leaves to pour out the venom. As a result, Loki is again described as shaking so violently that the planet shakes, and this process repeats until he breaks free, setting Ragnarök into motion

More Norse mythology:
item.description:
Instagram | Facebook | Shop 


(Music: Nytt Land - Ragnarök)

In Norse mythology, Sigyn is a goddess of fidelity and is the wife of Loki. 🐍  
Sigyn stays with Loki during his punishment, (He is bound by the guts of his own son, the only fetters that he cannot destroy and the venom of snake drips onto his face) she holds out a bowl to catch the dripping venom. However, when the bowl becomes full she leaves to pour out the venom. As a result, Loki is again described as shaking so violently that the planet shakes, and this process repeats until he breaks free, setting Ragnarök into motion

item.title: Towering Shadows
item.media:title: Towering Shadows
item.media:description:
www.patreon.com/andreasrocha
This image will be included in my next Illustration Pack (pledges close on the 28th February). Lately there has been a lot of buzz regarding Blender and I have been delving into that world trying to introduce 3d into my workflow learning from the large amount of resources available on the Internet. This is my first attempt and there were lots of hits and misses...I also took a lot of inspiration from the amazing Richard Wright.
item.description:
www.patreon.com/andreasrocha
This image will be included in my next Illustration Pack (pledges close on the 28th February). Lately there has been a lot of buzz regarding Blender and I have been delving into that world trying to introduce 3d into my workflow learning from the large amount of resources available on the Internet. This is my first attempt and there were lots of hits and misses...I also took a lot of inspiration from the amazing Richard Wright.

item.title: The best House and the best Father
item.media:title: The best House and the best Father
item.media:description:
BONUS SCENE:

 




FIIUUU  It's been so long i doesn't drawed the Indie House!

but here is, a big comic about they living life, and how the Neighbor is like
a Big father for everyone in the house (he cleans, cooks, helps and etc)

Good headcanons, so, there is, all the indies in the house (There's to many!!)
it was really difficult cause they have so much elaborate designs (that i love)
and they're like 14 indies! wow 

 

Later i gonna do a Sequel of this comic, and its gonna be about Ayano Aishi

welp, Hope You Like It!

item.title: Red Forest - Skyrim
item.media:title: Red Forest - Skyrim
item.media:description:
Manipulated screenshot from the game The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim.


"Eastmarch covers much of Skyrim's eastern border with Morrowind. The surrounding holds are Winterhold to the north, The Pale and Whiterun to the west and The Rift to the south. Central/south Eastmarch is a volcanically active area, plains with steaming gas leaking in between cracks in the ground, colorful, mineral filled bodies of water, and geysers. The far west of the hold resembles much of the rest of central Skyrim, and to the north a mountainous tundra, where the hold's capital Windhelm lies. The east is composed of the Velothi mountain range, which extends down to the Rift. The province's border with Morrowind can be accessed by road a short walk up the mountains from Windhelm, though the border cannot be crossed."  

"Eastmarch is one of the nine Holds of Skyrim, located along the eastern border. It is one of the four oldest holds in Skyrim, known collectively as Old Holds. The major city of Eastmarch is Windhelm, near the northern border. Ulfric Stormcloak is the Jarl of Windhelm and Eastmarch. Its symbol is a bear's head."
item.description:
Manipulated screenshot from the game The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim.


"Eastmarch covers much of Skyrim's eastern border with Morrowind. The surrounding holds are Winterhold to the north, The Pale and Whiterun to the west and The Rift to the south. Central/south Eastmarch is a volcanically active area, plains with steaming gas leaking in between cracks in the ground, colorful, mineral filled bodies of water, and geysers. The far west of the hold resembles much of the rest of central Skyrim, and to the north a mountainous tundra, where the hold's capital Windhelm lies. The east is composed of the Velothi mountain range, which extends down to the Rift. The province's border with Morrowind can be accessed by road a short walk up the mountains from Windhelm, though the border cannot be crossed."  

"Eastmarch is one of the nine Holds of Skyrim, located along the eastern border. It is one of the four oldest holds in Skyrim, known collectively as Old Holds. The major city of Eastmarch is Windhelm, near the northern border. Ulfric Stormcloak is the Jarl of Windhelm and Eastmarch. Its symbol is a bear's head."

item.title: [ARPG] Believe in Me
item.media:title: [ARPG] Believe in Me
item.media:description:
Due to Spam bots disrupting the deviation comments frequently, I think it's better to disable them entirely.
Hopefully some kind of solution will arise in the future; I appreciate those who have genuinely left compliments!! ;__;

____________________________________________________________________

Reposted from my ARPG account. I will be uploading choice pieces from that account as some of them I continue to argue are my best, or of a suitable quality to be included in my main gallery.
Some of these pieces have long since aged, but to some followers of mine, these were beloved and inspiring artworks to them.

The character to the right, Aeon, belongs to me, but is currently being reworked into my own species, the Arvani.
The prong like applications on her face and canine like muzzle do not represent the Tyrian species accurately and are character specific. 

Cherry on the left belongs to feyfawn 
Vayrons and Tyrians belong to Kelyias & Eternityspool . 
I do not claim Vayrons, Tyrians, nor do I claim any part of the ARPG World-Of-Reos. 

____________________________________________________________________

COMMISSION INFORMATION  // FURAFFINITY // PICARTO // TWITTER

DESIGN TOS AND MASTERIST  // Complete Masterlist logging and TOS of all designs in my Gallery
DRAGON DESIGN HUB // For Trading /Reselling Assistance and Promotion
item.description:
Due to Spam bots disrupting the deviation comments frequently, I think it's better to disable them entirely.
Hopefully some kind of solution will arise in the future; I appreciate those who have genuinely left compliments!! ;__;

____________________________________________________________________

Reposted from my ARPG account. I will be uploading choice pieces from that account as some of them I continue to argue are my best, or of a suitable quality to be included in my main gallery.
Some of these pieces have long since aged, but to some followers of mine, these were beloved and inspiring artworks to them.

The character to the right, Aeon, belongs to me, but is currently being reworked into my own species, the Arvani.
The prong like applications on her face and canine like muzzle do not represent the Tyrian species accurately and are character specific. 

Cherry on the left belongs to feyfawn 
Vayrons and Tyrians belong to Kelyias & Eternityspool . 
I do not claim Vayrons, Tyrians, nor do I claim any part of the ARPG World-Of-Reos.

DESIGN TOS AND MASTERIST  // Complete Masterlist logging and TOS of all designs in my Gallery

item.title: Graceful Gardevoir Render
item.media:title: Graceful Gardevoir Render
item.media:description:
If you wish to support me, here's my Patreon link:
www.patreon.com/djthed

Paypal Alternative:
goo.gl/YTgduc

--

I have once again found inspiration to do something Pokemon related again. Just like before, this is a heavily modified model of Gardevoir from the Nintendo 3DS games. Similar topology all around, except her face was completely reworked to have actual facial features instead of just a 2D texture. I spent around 3 days on this from start to finish, reworking topology, facial rigging, creating HD textures, among other things.

Those of you with a keen eye may have noticed that I added a few feminine details to this particular Gardevoir. And yes, this particular Gardevoir is female. Gardevoirs can appear as both male and female, but in the games, they have no visually distinct features. I didn't do this to over sexualize anything, it's just that I've always liked the idea of creating a distinction for those two variants. The male version would have differences from this model, like toned down eyelashes and chest down to how it was in Gardevoirs' original design.

As for my future Pony stuff, I think I've almost figured out wings. Those dang wings have been incredibly hard for me to understand for a while, but I for some reason refuse to give up and continue trying to figure out some of the anatomy (anatomy of the feathers especially, primary feathers and leading edge feathers). Hopefully I can get something to show soon, but there's still a few things I need to work out.

--

Special thanks to my patrons:
TheGreatSako
Katharine Berry
R&DFunder539
Bastler
CyberPon3
Flopzee
MCtoastie
JetWave
StableCoder
The Smiling Pony
item.description:
If you wish to support me, here's my Patreon link:
www.patreon.com/djthed

Paypal Alternative:
goo.gl/YTgduc

--

I have once again found inspiration to do something Pokemon related again. Just like before, this is a heavily modified model of Gardevoir from the Nintendo 3DS games. Similar topology all around, except her face was completely reworked to have actual facial features instead of just a 2D texture. I spent around 3 days on this from start to finish, reworking topology, facial rigging, creating HD textures, among other things.

Those of you with a keen eye may have noticed that I added a few feminine details to this particular Gardevoir. And yes, this particular Gardevoir is female. Gardevoirs can appear as both male and female, but in the games, they have no visually distinct features. I didn't do this to over sexualize anything, it's just that I've always liked the idea of creating a distinction for those two variants. The male version would have differences from this model, like toned down eyelashes and chest down to how it was in Gardevoirs' original design.

As for my future Pony stuff, I think I've almost figured out wings. Those dang wings have been incredibly hard for me to understand for a while, but I for some reason refuse to give up and continue trying to figure out some of the anatomy (anatomy of the feathers especially, primary feathers and leading edge feathers). Hopefully I can get something to show soon, but there's still a few things I need to work out.

item.title: master study: metal
item.media:title: master study: metal
item.media:description:
Today I upload my study of recent artwork published by Riot Games - Silver Kayle. I wanted to credit an artist instead of a studio but they did not credit the artist as well. If you happend to know person who painted this let me know in a comment.

Since it is 1st time that I upload a master study, I guess it is nice to explain how it works.
-pick an artwork that you love and set a goal, my goal here was to improve my rendering of metals (I focused on: helmet, pauldrons, chest)
-place the artwork somewhere on the screen, set new project in a drawing program and start to mimic original
-there are important rules: no tracing or colorpicking allowed (this is crucial to guess shapes and colors yourself in oreder to learn), you should work zoomed out for as long as you can
-when you move to details (now you can zoom in), you continue until you accomplish your goal
So far I find master studies the best and the fastest method of learning, you should try it yourself. And holy cow, working on this gave me so much power, now I want to draw something in similar setting.
item.description:
Today I upload my study of recent artwork published by Riot Games - Silver Kayle. I wanted to credit an artist instead of a studio but they did not credit the artist as well. If you happend to know person who painted this let me know in a comment.

Since it is 1st time that I upload a master study, I guess it is nice to explain how it works.
-pick an artwork that you love and set a goal, my goal here was to improve my rendering of metals (I focused on: helmet, pauldrons, chest)
-place the artwork somewhere on the screen, set new project in a drawing program and start to mimic original
-there are important rules: no tracing or colorpicking allowed (this is crucial to guess shapes and colors yourself in oreder to learn), you should work zoomed out for as long as you can
-when you move to details (now you can zoom in), you continue until you accomplish your goal
So far I find master studies the best and the fastest method of learning, you should try it yourself. And holy cow, working on this gave me so much power, now I want to draw something in similar setting.

item.title: + Comes to Paradise +
item.media:title: + Comes to Paradise +
item.media:description:
Fav & Comment to get a chance to win 1 Mini Chibi Rainbow
   


     
  Commissions : 【Here】  
  Support me without money : 【Here】  
     



 Yay, done with this one I think that most of my future illustration will have this type of composition, I really enjoy to draw rainbows and crystal like those
 OCs : Lunalys & Nightningal
Designed by AngeKrystaleen & RushioruSama
